title: Bose’s boldest QuietComfort Ultra headphones are cheaper than ever
summary: We recommend them at full price, but they’re even better at $145 off. | Photo: Chris Welch / The Verge There’s no question that Bose’s last-gen QuietComfort Ultra are some of the brand’s best noise-canceling headphones, especially if you’re a frequent traveler or someone who values peace and quiet …
